attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
LegalizeDrugs

Mt Brown - Our children are dying.
Mr Brown - Our Children are being put into prison.
Mr Brown- Our Family's are being torn apart.

Mr Brown- THE DEALERS ARE MAKING THOUSANDS UPON THOUSANDS OF POUNDS A DAY.
Mr Brown -You know what's happening on our streets. And if you don't, you should not be in office.
Mr Brown-Please - Legalize Drugs.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
